en_US.publish-document-confirmation-body: Once it is published it will not be editable anymore. it will become visible to other users and everyone will be able to comment.
en_US.publish-document-confirmation-title: Do you wish to publish this document now?
en_US.username-too-short: Username too short, it should be 4 characters or more
en_US.username-invalid: Invalid username, it should contain only basic characters
en_US.publish-error: An error has occurred when trying to publish the document.
